summary: A former war photographer and her physician husband are caught up in a riot when locals in an Andean village vent their unhappiness with contamination from a nearby mine.
cast: Magaly Solier|Jasmin Tabatabai|Olivier Gourmet|Arturo Anacarino Zarate|Malku Choquehuillca|Edgar Condori|Behi Djanati Atai|Kian Lawson-Khalili|Sonia Loaiza|Hermelinda Luján|Norma Martínez|Andreas Pietschmann|Antonio Quevedo|Edgar Quispe|Rodolfo Rodríguez
director: Directors: Peter Brosens, Jessica Woodworth (as Jessica Hope Woodworth)
title: Altiplano
